lines.text: How about this- it was to combo with the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard!</c>
Yeah- a plan to defend himself from Slick's gun!
Like, he'd set himself on fire- or maybe that was an accident, he'd just set a fire around him...
And then the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> would cast <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum</c> on the flames!
Yeah! Normally they wouldn't get in the way of a bullet, but if they were frozen, they'd be like solid walls!
Well, maybe- but that brings up a pretty pressin' question, then.
If the plan was to have the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> cast that spell- why not cast it on Slick?
Wouldn't that make more sense? Freeze the guy with the gun, not some wall of fire?
Uh... hm. Yeah, I... guess that'd make more sense.
In fact... why didn't he do that, anyway?
Well, one thing at a time. I get the feelin' we'll be figurin' that out soon.
